abstract: Pres-elect Donald J Trump has promised to focus on campaign platform issues starting with his first official day in office; experts say he may face some legal and procedural hurdles, but most of his Day 1 pledges involve issuing presidential directives, executive orders or memorandums that do not need legislative approval.

headline.print_headline: Day 1 of Trump’s Presidency: He Will Be Bringing a Long To-Do List
headline.main: Donald Trump’s Long To-Do List for Day 1

snippet: Mr. Trump has promised to redirect immigration enforcement, alter trade relations with China, impose new rules on lobbyists, lift curbs on guns and demand a new strategy for defeating ISIS....
lead_paragraph: Mr. Trump has promised to redirect immigration enforcement, alter trade relations with China, impose new rules on lobbyists, lift curbs on guns and demand a new strategy for defeating ISIS.
